content:
As an AI language model, I do not have personal experiences or preferences, but here is some information that might help. 

Chippenham's local cuisine is best enjoyed during the summer season, particularly from May to September. During this time, many of the local eateries offer outdoor seating areas that overlook the picturesque countryside or river, which adds to the overall dining experience. Additionally, many of the seasonal ingredients used in the local cuisine, such as strawberries and asparagus, are readily available during the summer months. The warm weather also makes it easier to explore the town and its surrounding areas, giving visitors the opportunity to discover new restaurants, food festivals, and local markets.
